item.title: New blog with Hugo
item.description: Blogging with Hugo This is the first blog post that I’ve created with Hugo. I have to say that I’m very satisfied with it. It is a publicly available in GitHub along with my website. It is automatically deployed with [Netlify] every time I push to the public Github repo and the configuration process has been easy and fast. All the configuration needed for Netlify is here, and of course, there are two things I really love about it:
